comments: Dr. Henry is extremely helpful & actually cares. He gives amazing feedback & will allow you to resubmit assignments when you make changes that he recommends in feedback. His job is not to grade you but to teach you, so that you actually learn something. He is an amazing professor who will help you, guide you, be your friend, and get you to that "A"

Henry is AMAZING. He is easy to talk to and just a cool guy! He gave so much feedback on the research paper that I was so surprised at his dedication. Most teachers don\'t give as much feedback as he did, & it was so helpful! Probably the best professor I\'ve had. He\'s smart, accessible and interesting. TAKE HIM!!!!
Great Dean of the CJ Dept (though some of his teachers staff should be fired!) Thank you unions! Henry will aswear & help in petitioning most SDSU class replacement waivers! Friendly & kind!!

Senior Thesis. He\'s a fairly lenient grader. The hardest part was finding people to interview (3 people) in your find of study. The whole essay is 25 pages, double-spaced, and you have to transcribe the interviews. No class time, all online. He was really busy this semester, so he didn\'t send back many ideas for corrections. Fairly easy A.

Thesis class wasn\'t very difficult since Dr. Henry splits up the paper into sections due throughout the semester. He returns them with suggestions to incorporate into the final thesis. Very helpful.Interesting too.
